title: Collaboration Item Commented
description: Fires when a comment is added to an item.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of the item being commented on.

commentId.description: The unique identifier of the newly created comment.

itemType.description: The type of item being commented on.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the workspace the item belongs to.

isReply.description: Whether this comment is a reply to another comment.

parentCommentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent comment if this is a reply.
